default.description: Flag indicating if this organization membership is the default one for the user.

url.description: The URL for accessing the details of this organization membership.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the organization membership was last updated.

created_at.description: The date and time when the organization membership was created.

id.description: Unique identifier for the organization membership.

user_id.description: The ID of the user associated with the organization membership.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization associated with the membership.

organization_name.description: The name of the organization associated with the membership.

view_tickets.description: Flag indicating if the user can view tickets within the organization.
